name: ATTrackingManager
desc: A class that provides a tracking authorization request and the tracking authorization status of the app.

items.name: class func requestTrackingAuthorization(completionHandler: (ATTrackingManager.AuthorizationStatus) -> Void)
items.desc: The request for user authorization to access app-related data.

items.name: class var trackingAuthorizationStatus: ATTrackingManager.AuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The authorization status that is current for the calling application.

items.name: enum ATTrackingManager.AuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The status values for app tracking authorization.
